attributes.action: Dear mr brown,can you please tell the tax payers of scotland if mr eric joyce mp for falkirk has paid capital gains tax,and if he has not will he resign ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr eric joyce a labour mp for falkirk scotland,will not answer the question "has he paid any capital gains tax "on two homes he sold.
as a tax payer of the uk,this is my right to know this.
